title: Jersey Shore's Angelina Pivarnick claims JWoww's new boyfriend hit on her in Las Vegas
text:
What happens in Vegas doesn't always stay in Vegas.

And Angelina Pivarnick claimed that Jenni JWoww Farley's new boyfriend Zack Clayton Carpinello got a little handsy with her while filming Jersey Shore in Sin City earlier this year.

Upon returning back home, Angelina told her fiance Chris Larangeira that Zack, 24, grabbed her, an accusation that Farley finds out through the grape vine as the reality stars battle it out in a trailer for the upcoming episode.

Yikes: Angelina Pivarnick claimed that Jenni JWoww Farley's new boyfriend Zack Clayton Carpinello got a little handsy with her while filming Jersey Shore in Sin City earlier this year

'I just feel his hand go right on me,' she told her fiance while motioning with her hand that he touched her butt, before he fired back with a shocking 'no.'

Chris called the professional wrestler a 'clown' before threatening to 'knock his teeth out' for grabbing his lady.

Vinny Guadagnino — who has become quite the coveted stripper in Las Vegas — sat down for a confessional.

Not great: Upon returning back home, Angelina told her fiance Chris Larangeira that Zack, 24, grabbed her, an accusation that Farley finds out through the grape vine as the reality stars battle it out in a trailer for the upcoming episode

'I just feel his hand go right on me,' she told her fiance while motioning with her hand that he touched her butt, before he fired back with a shocking 'no'

Jokes: Chris called the professional wrestler a 'clown' before threatening to 'knock his teeth out' for grabbing his lady

Diving deep: While JWoww addressed the issue with her friends Nicole Snooki Polizzi and her meatball counterpart Deena Nicole Cortese, they questioned Angelina's motives surrounding the story

'I'm seriously worried about the next time we're going to be together,' he told the MTV cameras. 'Now its an all out war'

While JWoww addressed the issue with her friends Nicole Snooki Polizzi and her meatball counterpart Deena Nicole Cortese, they questioned Angelina's motives surrounding the story.

'How much do you commit to a lie?' Jenni asked the girls.

'This can break up my engagement,' Angelina screamed. 'How f***ing dare her!'

Oh no! As JWoww grows impossibly angry by the situation, she stands up and starts yelling at Angelina and they both grab bottles off the table ready to battle

'This can break up my engagement,' Angelina screamed. 'How f***ing dare her!'

Support: Deena jumps in between the ladies who are on opposite sides of the table and urges the women to stop fighting

It was time for family dinner, Jersey Shore style, and the group was back together once again.

As JWoww grows impossibly angry by the situation, she stands up and starts yelling at Angelina and they both grab bottles off the table ready to battle.

Deena jumps in between the ladies who are on opposite sides of the table and urges the women to stop fighting.

One scene shows a dramatic Snooki standing in the parking lot with JWoww, screaming: 'She's a f***ing liar!'

Jersey Shore: Family Vacation airs on the MTV network at 8 p.m. on Thursdays.
description: Angelina told her fiance Chris Larangeira that Zack, 24, grabbed her, an accusation that Farley finds out through the grape vine as the reality stars battle it out in a trailer for the upcoming episode
